attributes.title: Extremely disgusting app!
attributes.review: Using this app made me feel like I was being a racist!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD‼️(puts viruses on your electronics)
attributes.review: ‼️ATTENTION TRUMP SUPPORTERS‼️As you can see from the title of this review you should NOT download this app. I, Karen Fred do NOT recommend this app for ANYONE. I support Trump myself and I’m sorry to say to my fellow trump supporters, but this app is an absolute DISAPPOINTMENT. If I could give this app a half star I would. I’m disappointed in my President Donald J. Trump. If this really is the official trump app, trump you should’ve done better. I download this to catch up on Donald Trump’s new plans, but it turns out this app puts VIRUSES on your phone, computer, tablet etc. TRUST me I’ve downloaded it on all three of my electronics and every single one has been glitching, shutting down and acting up ever since. I DO NOT recommend this to ANYBODY‼️. Please get rid of this app, I wouldn’t be happy if my other fellow trump supporters had viruses on there electronic as well. Love you Trump😫just not your app.

attributes.title: Ugly? You gotta be kiddin me😎
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see how great our non racist, non sexist, non mysoginistic “president” was going to do for “America the great country”. But low key he’s so bad that I would rather eat a Cheeto that I found in a dumpster than I would vote for the Cheeto running for office🤢

attributes.title: trash🤮
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because genz✨ anywhoozies. i refuse to let this cheeto puff to try and be re-elected for president. i refuse to let a racist, ra(p)ist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, pedo, and so much more back into office when we didnt want him there int he first place. he’s absolutely disgusting, and quite frankly a disgrace to human kind. anyway genz wont go down with a fight and he must realize that.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This has ruined my life! You have disrespected my my teachings and my entire culture. Please remove immediately this is DISGUSTANG.

attributes.title: Wish I could give it a 0
attributes.review: I don’t think you can get a worse app than this. I’m just gonna leave this here and hope the app gets taken down 🙄🙄

attributes.title: This app
attributes.review: This app is a complete lie and should be taken down
